Subject: Camp Cookery and Magical Meals to Prevent Trailside Tragedy - Sign Up Errata
Description: Come learn some tips and tricks for camp cookery. We will focus on backpacking meal planning and on trail prep. Discussion points will include types of backpacking stoves and cook kits, dehydration, DIY freeze drying, cold soak meals, and trail baking. Recipes will be available and possibly meal samples too! Space is limited, please sign up in advance near Ops!  Speakers include:Alex Drummer, chloe  zrnich - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour
